document_data.name: Sharia Oriest
document_data.mainbody: '''Sharia Oriest''' was a shopkeeper of [[Rigor's Fabrics]] in [[Skullport]].
document_data.History: Rumors said that Sharia had once lived in [[Waterdeep]], where she worked as a servant of a noblewoman, but she happened to see a murder and fled to Skullport to avoid the killer. By [[1370 DR]], Sharia managed, with her uncooperative daughter [[Villiane]], a shop selling burlap and canvas.
document_data.Personality: Sharia had tried to educate Villiane on the beauty of the surface, but she spent all her free time with rogues and her mother feared that she would find a bad end.
